price: 16. Y así es como hemos revelado (el Corán) en claras aleyas. Y, ciertamente, Al-lah guía a quien quiere.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يُرِيدُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-anna al-laha yahdī man yurīdu
